item.title: Video Advent 2014 – Day 25
item.dc:creator: stiffy
item.description:
Michael Zoidis created this perfect, hypnotic, smoky video for Kiasmos' beautiful track "Held".

The post Video Advent 2014 – Day 25 appeared first on James Stiff.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Video Advent 2014 – Day 19
item.dc:creator: stiffy
item.description:
Wake up, take a pill, go to work, watch buildings collapse around you. Just an average day really. The Bug "Function / Void" directed by Factory Fifteen.

item.content:encoded:

item.title: Video Advent 2014 – Day 18
item.dc:creator: stiffy
item.description:
Strictly Come Dancing takes a bizarre turn in director Jessie Kanda's vision for "Thievery" by Arca (not to be confused with the Asbestos Removal Contractors Association). I'm not sure Brucie would approve.

The post Video Advent 2014 – Day 18 appeared first on James Stiff.
item.content:encoded:
Strictly Come Dancing takes a bizarre turn in director Jessie Kanda's vision for "Thievery" by Arca (not to be confused with the Asbestos Removal Contractors Association). I'm not sure Brucie would approve.

The post Video Advent 2014 – Day 18 appeared first on James Stiff.

item.title: Video Advent 2014 – Day 17
item.dc:creator: stiffy
item.description:
In FaltyDL's "New Haven" a strange and terrible disease grips its victims. Symptoms include heavy, rhythmic breathing and the compulsion to jog down the middle of the street.  

The post Video Advent 2014 – Day 17 appeared first on James Stiff.
item.content:encoded:
In FaltyDL's "New Haven" a strange and terrible disease grips its victims. Symptoms include heavy, rhythmic breathing and the compulsion to jog down the middle of the street.
